queries.compiledQueryString: select * from OCTData.feedmessage natural join GTFS.trips where run_id = '${inputs.selected_timestamp.value}' and trip_route = '${inputs.selected_route.value}'
queries.inputQueryString: select * from OCTData.feedmessage natural join GTFS.trips where run_id = '${inputs.selected_timestamp.value}' and trip_route = '${inputs.selected_route.value}'

queries.compiledQueryString: select * from GTFS.shapes where shape_id in (select shape_id from GTFS.trips where trip_id in (select trip_id from OCTData.feedmessage natural join GTFS.trips where run_id = '${inputs.selected_timestamp.value}' and trip_route = '${inputs.selected_route.value}'))
queries.inputQueryString: select * from GTFS.shapes where shape_id in ${trips_shapeid}

queries.compiledQueryString: select shape_id from GTFS.trips where trip_id in (select trip_id from OCTData.feedmessage natural join GTFS.trips where run_id = '${inputs.selected_timestamp.value}' and trip_route = '${inputs.selected_route.value}')
queries.inputQueryString: select shape_id from GTFS.trips where trip_id in ${trips}

queries.compiledQueryString: select trip_id from OCTData.feedmessage natural join GTFS.trips where run_id = '${inputs.selected_timestamp.value}' and trip_route = '${inputs.selected_route.value}'
queries.inputQueryString: select trip_id from OCTData.feedmessage natural join GTFS.trips where run_id = '${inputs.selected_timestamp.value}' and trip_route = '${inputs.selected_route.value}'

queries.compiledQueryString: select distinct strftime(run_timestamp, '%B %-d %Y - %I:%M:%S %p') as frts, run_id from OCTData.feedmessage
queries.inputQueryString: select distinct strftime(run_timestamp, '%B %-d %Y - %I:%M:%S %p') as frts, run_id from OCTData.feedmessage
